alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Mower; Olmsted; Wabasha; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 7:22PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeast Minnesota and far west central Wisconsin through 800 PM CDT... At 721 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Grand Meadow to Lewiston. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Winona, Alma, Buffalo, Stewartville, Byron, Goodview, St. Charles, Plainview, Chatfield, Eyota, Lewiston, Oronoco, Elgin, Buffalo City, Fountain City, Dover, Stockton, Rollingstone and Altura. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 193 and 248. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Minnesota.
